snippet.title: Garden Veggie Juice
snippet.description: Why pay the price for veggie juice with preservatives and additives when you can make your own--fresh.

snippet.title: The Fish Dish
snippet.description: Fish with crumb/cheese topping. I have no idea what this was originally called!

snippet.title: Tuna 'n Egg Casserole for Cats
snippet.description: Quick & easy (and cheap!) homemade cat food. Use organics to eliminate unnatural chemicals & additives that regular cat food has in it.

snippet.title: Cat Cora's To-Die-For Garlic Mashed Potatoes
snippet.description: Extra rich, extra creamy and totally irresistible!

snippet.title: Duck Soup (For Ferrets)
snippet.description: When my ferrets get sick or are recovering from surgery, I use this "formula" to get them back on their little feet.

snippet.title: Spinach and Cheese Mashed Potatoes
snippet.description: An Amish dish that is America's Midwestern comfort food at its very best. BF made this for supper with a few low fat substitutions and extra cheese:D...

snippet.title: Chicken Dish from Netherlands Antilles - Original
snippet.description: This recipe has been in my family for years, we've got it from a neighbour in Rotterdam (Netherlands). I am sure my mother has changed it some over...

snippet.title: Turkey, Bacon Pasta Salad With Lemon Basil Dressing
snippet.description: Great pasta salad, you can substitute your favorite pasta dressing instead of the Lemon Basil. My adaptation of a recipe from Betty Crocker.

snippet.title: Zucchini and Corn
snippet.description: This is a recipe my BF found on-line and features his favorite combination of vegetables. It's a really delicious Mexican recipe. Instead of a leaf...

snippet.title: From Scratch Tuna Noodle Casserole
snippet.description: I searched but didn't see another recipe exactly like this one posted, so I hope I'm not posting a repeat! You'll never go back to canned...
